headline: Sauce Labs review
description: Sauce Labs is an ideal tool for large businesses because it has global presence and decades of experience in making browser testing tools. Read our review of Sauce Labs - a browser testing tool.

offers.description: Manual testing on real and virtual devices (per month)
Automated and manual testing on virtual devices (per month)
Automated and manual testing on real and virtual devices (per month)

negativeNotes: High network latency during live testing
Slow availability of new devices and operating systems
positiveNotes: Powerful API available to run tests from command line
Large number of real devices and browsers available for testing
Can set-up high availability connections for local testing

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Browser testing tool
reviewBody: Sauce Labs has a global presence and is ideal for large businesses. It provides a large number of devices and browsers and it is also possible to purchase private devices for testing. However, it has only a limited number of integrations and suffers from high latency during live testing.
